name: Bearskull
description:
Sorkin, the evil pumpkin magician is up to mischief! He must be stopped, but his power prevents any living creature from harming him!

Maybe a special hero can still defeat him!?

If you manage to stop Sorkin, use different potions and weapons, and once you get stuck, your friend Skull will help you
you have to make it together. But the different levels don't make it easier to get hold of Sorkin.

Use your mouse to move around the world if you are faced with an enemy who is too strong for you. Use your bear punch or just take cover.
